control.name: List
control.helpHtml: A verticle list of options that can be selected with a click.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Options
property.helpHtml: Defines what the list will contain. An option for enabling codes can also be used. Codes allow for more precise visibility and validation conditions.

property.name: Initial value
property.helpHtml: Selects one of the options from the list as its initial value.

property.name: Header text
property.helpHtml: Sets the title of the columns.

property.name: Multi select
property.helpHtml: Allows multiple selections when choosing options in the list.

property.name: Slide down
property.helpHtml: Makes the contents hide or show when tapped, similar to how a dropdown list functions.

property.name: Fixed height
property.helpHtml: The open list overlaps content below it.

property.name: Select away
property.helpHtml: Select an option from the open list to close it.

property.name: Click away
property.helpHtml: Click away from the open list to close it.

control.getDetailsFunction: return {header: this.header, slide: this.slide && { selectAway: this.selectAway, clickAway: this.clickAway }, multi:this.multi};

runtimeProperty.name: Selected values
